projects.name: 图片搜索
projects.scene_description: A cozy home living room with comfortable sofa, warm ambient lighting, bookshelf in the background, and some decorative items. The feeling is casual and inviting.
projects.character_description: An energetic young woman with shoulder-length hair, wearing colorful casual wear, expressive face, and dynamic body language. She brings excitement and enthusiasm.

projects.name: safaf
projects.scene_description: A modern minimalist studio with clean white walls, soft natural lighting from large windows, a simple wooden desk, and some green plants. The atmosphere is professional yet warm.
projects.character_description: A young Asian woman in her 20s with long black hair, wearing casual trendy clothes, friendly smile, confident posture. She has a warm and approachable personality.

shots.video_description: The host holds up the product, showing it from different angles with enthusiasm
shots.voiceover_text: Hey everyone! Check out this amazing product that's going to change your life...

shots.video_description: The host demonstrates how to use the product, explaining the steps clearly
shots.voiceover_text: What I absolutely love about this is the incredible quality and attention to detail...

shots.video_description: The host shows a before and after comparison, highlighting the difference
shots.voiceover_text: This will save you so much time and make your life so much easier...

shots.video_description: The host looks at the camera with a smile, making a call to action gesture
shots.voiceover_text: Click the link below to get yours now! Limited time offer, don't miss out!
